verbs.description: What [V: should] be the focus of coverage when three United States prisoners are freed from North Korea ? If you ’re the journalists at CNN overnight , you make sure to mention the Robert Mueller investigation , Stormy Daniels and to worry about Donald Trump getting credit for these Americans returning .
